org.hibernate.loader.spi

Interface LoadPlanAdvisor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityGraphBasedLoadPlanAdvisor, NoOpLoadPlanAdvisor

    public interface LoadPlanAdvisor
    An advisor that can be made available to the ResultSetProcessor and ScrollableResultSetProcessor. The processors consult with the advisor, if one is provided, as a means to influence the load plan, meaning that the advisor might add fetches. A caveat is that any added fetches cannot be join fetches (they cannot alter the SQL); if a fetch is added as FetchTiming.IMMEDIATE, it must be a "subsequent form": FetchStyle.SELECT, FetchStyle.SUBSELECT, FetchStyle.BATCH.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoadPlan advise(LoadPlan loadPlan)
      Advise on the given LoadPlan, returning a new LoadPlan if any additions are needed.

    • Method Detail

      • advise

        LoadPlan advise(LoadPlan loadPlan)
        Advise on the given LoadPlan, returning a new LoadPlan if any additions are needed. It is the responsibility of the advisor to return the original load plan if no additions were needed
        Parameters:
        loadPlan - The load plan to advise on.
        Returns:
        The original or advised load plan.
